attributes.action:
Limit or Ban LED Headlights in all vehicles.
They are blinding on low beam.
attributes.additional_details: Look at restricting LEDs in all cars vans motorcycles. They are dangerous, distracting and also cause a blinding effect when the vehicle passes.
attributes.background:
All vehicles must follow strict restrictions on LED headlights. Ban them on all cars.
They are blinding on low beam for all road users. And for those with low down vehicles, you can't tell the difference between high or low beam.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233
